channel.title: Lower coal consumption, if power consumption is not 100%
channel.description:
The Biomass Burner has "the resource consumption is automatically lowered". I was wondering: - Is there any mod that enables you to build a setup that simulates this behavior? Say a belt splitter that stops if the accumulator charge is above 90% and starts if it's below 105?
Or
- Is there a mod that has generators with this property? ("the resource consumption is automatically lowered")

item.title: Lower coal consumption, if power consumption is not 100%

The Biomass Burner has “the resource consumption is automatically lowered”.
I was wondering:

    Say a belt splitter that stops if the accumulator charge is above 90% and starts if it’s below 105?
